shadow.name: CONFUSION
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Before Completion, expressing through confusion

gift.name: IMAGINATION
gift.description: The gift frequency of Before Completion, expressing through imagination

siddhi.name: ILLUMINATION
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Before Completion, expressing through illumination

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 64 shadow frequency. The confusion you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural imagination. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from confusion to imagination.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your head. Notice the sensation of confusion.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 64 consciously for 7 days, the confusion pattern will shift toward imagination.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 64 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from confusion toward imagination
